abstracts.cdata!:
The Zihuatanejo Tourism Project will
            involve construction of the infrastructure required for
            establishing a new tourist resort at Ixtapa and
            rehabilitating and expanding the nearby town of Zihuatanejo
            and a new airport. Feasibility studies for other tourism
            zones and training programs for hotel personnel are included.
